blocks.name: namespace:Deepslate
blocks.//comment the namespace: is optional, if none is defined, 'ext:' will be prepended
blocks.//comment: You can fill the string array: Fill priority is side faces-> top face -> bottom face; this means that with 1 texture all faces will be the same while with 2 array entries the first texture will be rendered to the sides and the second path is for the top and bottom face
blocks.//comment: possible types are: AIR, STONE, SOIL, WOOD, GLASS, WATER, SAND, PLANT, LEAVES, WOOL, LAVA, METAL, GRAVEL
